    • Constructor Detail

      • SettingsManager

        public SettingsManager​(javafx.stage.Stage stage,
                       javafx.scene.Scene settingsScene,
                       javafx.scene.Scene menuScene,
                       javafx.scene.Group group,
                       javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas,
                       javafx.scene.text.Font titleFont,
                       javafx.scene.text.Font menuFont)
        Constructor to initialise the settings scene by calling initSettings
        Parameters:
        stage - - current stage to be passed through
        settingsScene - - settings scene passed through from ViewManager
        menuScene - - menu scene passed through from viewManager
        group - - group passed from viewManager
        canvas - - canvas passed from viewManager
        titleFont - - Passes the font to be used for initSettings
        menuFont - - Passes the menu font to be used for initSettings

    • Method Detail

      • initSettings

        private void initSettings​(javafx.stage.Stage stage,
                          javafx.scene.Scene settingsScene,
                          javafx.scene.Scene menuScene,
                          javafx.scene.Group group,
                          javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas,
                          javafx.scene.text.Font titleFont,
                          javafx.scene.text.Font menuFont)
        Initialises the settings scene by formatting UI labels and adding to HBox / VBox
        Parameters:
        stage - - stage to be acted upon
        settingsScene - - settings scene to be passed through
        menuScene - - menu scene to be passed through
        group - - current group to add elements to
        canvas - - canvas to be added to group
        titleFont - - title font to be used for a label
        menuFont - - menu font to be used for smaller labels

      • initView

        public void initView​(javafx.stage.Stage stage,

        Initialises the view when switching to the settings scene Sets title, colour and sizes scene
        Parameters:
        stage - - current stage to be acted on
        settingsScene - - scene to set for stage

      • initEventHandlers

        private void initEventHandlers​(javafx.scene.Scene scene,
                               javafx.scene.Scene menuScene,
                               javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        Initialises event listener to detect when window is resized and sets text position relative to window and detects button mouseover / mouseenter
        Parameters:
        menuScene - - menu scene to be set if return button is clicked
        scene - - current settings scene to add mouse event listeners to
        stage - - current stage to be acted on

        private void incrementIndex​(int i,
                            java.lang.String[] arr,
                            java.lang.String type)
        Increments index of array passed
        Parameters:
        arr - - Array passed through used to check if index is less than total length of the array
        i - - Current value of the index
        type - - Name of value to be changed
